issue.title: Controlling Pan Tilt Gimbal using JointControlPlugin and JointStatePublisher

content.raw: I figured it out.  I had done a ‘sudo apt upgrade’ yesterday and libignition-transport8 got installed which apparently broke compatibility.  If I force it to use 7.4.0, it works as usual.  I’m removing version 8 and hopefully I’ll be good to go.
content.html: I figured it out. I had done a ‘sudo apt upgrade’ yesterday and libignition-transport8 got installed which apparently broke compatibility. If I force it to use 7.4.0, it works as usual. I’m removing version 8 and hopefully I’ll be good to go.
